name: Why Voxpure uses 180-second UV-C cycle
description: The Voxpure Smart Water Bottle uses a 180-second UV-C LED sterilization cycle to ensure deep pathogen penetration and comprehensive microbial deactivation, including bacteria, viruses, and protozoa. This cycle length is calibrated to deliver 30–40 mJ/cm² of UV-C dosage at 275±5nm wavelength, achieving 99.99% efficacy across diverse water qualities. Extended duration enhances safety margins in challenging conditions (e.g., murky or cold water) without increasing energy or safety risk, validated by lab trials and IEC 62471 compliance.
evidenceLevel: Scientific calibration and ISO/IEC 17025-certified lab trials

expertiseAuthorityTrust.expertise: Cycle timing engineered by Voxpure's R&D team based on pathogen kill curves and validated sterilization dose profiles.
expertiseAuthorityTrust.authority: Standardized duration supported by peer-reviewed UV-C sterilization research and Voxpure's certified microbiology lab results.
